about_the_game:
Where They go: First Person adventure puzzle game with intense horror and world changing mechanics.

A unique blend of inspirations from BioShock, Amnesia, Alien Isolation, Little Nightmares and MYST. This First Person puzzle adventure horror game delivers intense horror and thrilling gameplay.

You play as Nia, a fourteen year old girl, pulled into a nightmare world. You will need to learn how to navigate the mysterious hotel you find yourself in and learn why you were brought to such a haunting place.

The Witch, as she is known by, is a blind creature that stalks the shifting halls of the hotel. She hunts for you, investigating every sound in salivating hope that she will catch you.

A flashlight that doubles as a key. A camera capable of opening portals. These and others are tools at your disposal that you must master to be able to navigate the hotel.

Hide in furniture, or run and slide behind piles of boxes. Throw items to create distractions then try and slip by. Just remember, they are listening for any hint of you.

Shifting walls, portals from photographs, and interactive sculptures. The hotel changes around you and you have to learn how to adapt to it. Use your wits and your gear to open passages and places of refuge.

Play the Award winning demo and Wishlist today!

content_descriptors.notes: Intense horror and horror themes.  Some gore is used, but most violence is implied from sound and off screen eluding. Mild language and intense scenes depicting horrific depictions of atrocities and mature themes.

name: Where They Go

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: 4 core / 8 threads | Intel Core i7-7700 | Ryzen 5 1400
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce RTX 3060 | Radeon RX 7700 XT
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 50 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: 4 core / 8 threads | Intel Core i9 11900K | Ryzen 5 5600X
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce RTX 3080 | Radeon RX 7800 XT
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 50 GB available space

short_description: You play as Nia, a young girl pulled into a nightmare by a malevolent entity. You must try and make your way through the maze of a mysterious hotel with it's shifting walls and strange sites. Use unique gear to solve puzzles, all while you are hunted by a relentless monster.
